data.text:
Nino Okropiridze

Surgeon, Obstetrician-Gynecologist

1187

Nino Okropiridze - The credo of life

I am well aware of the fact that nothing can be taken from this life, except for the sown seeds of kindness, warmth, and love. Accordingly, my life is built on this principle. I wish health to my loved ones and patients, and hope their wishes come true!

Working Place

Imedi Clinic

38 Vepkhistkaosani str., Tbilisi, Georgia

(032) 2 23 65 56

Make an Appointment

Need a doctor’s consultation?

Submit your information below and please wait for a response.

Working Hours:

Mon.-Fri. – 10:00 – 17:00

Pre-registration required!

Specialty

Obstetrics-Gynecology, Surgery, Pediatric Gynecology

Scientific Rank

Professional interests

Conservative Gynecology

Antenatal Observation

Laparoscopic Surgery

Professional Skills

Health Care 100%

Patient Relationship 100%

Professional Development 100%

Personal Information

Nino Okropiridze

Date of birth: 01.03.1981

Specialty:

Obstetrician-gynecologist, surgeon-gynecologist, laparoscopist, and pediatric gynecologist.

Conservative gynecology, antenatal observation (nursing care of pregnant women).

Place of work: Imedi clinic

Field of activity: Surgery, Gynecology

Medical experience: since 2009

1998 – Tbilisi State Medical College;

2004 – Tbilisi State Medical University.

2009-2010 – Mtskheta Regional Multidisciplinary Center, doctor of the department of obstetrics and gynecology;

2010 – Obstetrician-gynecologist of Imedi clinic, including a pediatric gynecologist, conservative gynecology, antenatal observation, obstetric and gynecologic, as well as laparoscopic surgery.

2004-2007 – Chachava Perinatal Medicine and Obstetrics and Gynecology Scientific-Research Institute, specialized residency training – a full course in obstetrics and gynecology;

2008-2009 – Tbilisi Experimental Maternity House, specialized residency training – a full course in obstetrics and gynecology;

2015 – France, CICE qualification in gynecological endoscopy;

2017 – Antenatal diagnosis of congenital heart diseases during pregnancy – Jo Ann Medical Center;

2018 – Timely diagnosis, prevention of development of the early postpartum bleeding and the treatment principles;

2018 – Antenatal screening tests of the fetus, timely detection of the pathological condition, and adequate management.

UNFPA Sustain -“Reproductive Health Initiative for Youth in the South Caucasus” Training Course

Association Of Obstetricians – Gynecology and perinatology of Georgia EMSA educational-scientific work

Association Of Obstetricians – Gynecology and perinatology of Georgia – Laparoscopy in Gynecology

BIMS international medical summit – Participant of Congress

Advanced Techniques In Gynecological Endoscopy – Laparoscopy, CICE – international center for endoscopic surgery (Karl Storz) Clermont-Ferrand-France

Georgian – Native

Russian – Fluent

English – Fluent
